SEARCH
Package collectables

Class Power

java.lang.Object
collectables.Collectable
collectables.Power
public class Power extends Collectable
Class to create Powers. Powers give the player special abilities such as shield, extra life of fast movement. If a Power is collected when is already equipped it gives points instead.

    • Power

      public Power(int x, int y, int kind)
      Creates a new Power.
      Parameters:
      x - width index
      y - height index
      kind - kind of power, points are assigned specifically with a switch on this
